name: Luscious Lemon Curd
description: Pucker up! A tangy, sweet, and creamy lemon pie filling, without the crust! Making lemon curd has never been easierÂ­. Say goodbye to separating out the egg yolk and good riddance to a pesky double boiler! This lemon curd uses whole eggs and is made in the microwave. Spread over scones, drizzle over ice cream, or lick straight from the spoon!
preparation:
1. In a 4-Cup Prep Bowl, whisk eggs until foamy. Add mix and water; whisk until well combined.
  2. Microwave, uncovered, on high for 2 min, until thickened, whisking halfway through and at the end. If the curd has not thickened after 2 min, cook for additional 30 sec intervals, whisking after each, until desired thickness is achieved.
  3. Whisk in butter, if desired.
  4. Cover; refrigerate for at least 1 hour, or until cooled.
tips: Make Lemon Tarts! Fill prebaked, cooled tart shells with cooled prepared curd. There is enough filling to fill 12 tart shells or 24 mini tart shells.
